entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , New-Wes-Valley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:53 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pool's Island 6:30 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022
Temperature: -3.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -7.8°C
Wind: SW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8 except minus 3 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 8 except minus 3 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to a few rain showers in the morning and ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022
